name: The Jumping Burger Rush
summary:
From the creative minds at The Jumping Food Games comes a fast-paced endless game that will put your reflexes to the test: "The Jumping Burger Rush". In this neon-colored adventure, you control a jumping burger through the vastness of the galaxy and try to push your high score higher and higher. The adrenaline-pumping gameplay will test your reflexes in a fast and challenging endless game where you have to maneuver your burger through a dangerous, neon-lit galaxy.

Endless challenges await as you dodge obstacles, overcome tricky passages, and collect points to beat your own high score over and over again. Can you manage to break your personal record time and time again, dominating the leaderboard and proving your skill by outding yourself? Jump, dodge, and maneuver your burger through the infinite galaxy, mastering the unstoppable pace to beat your high score.
